detail_desc: Long-sleeved polo-neck top in ribbed jersey made from a modal and cotton blend.
Long-sleeved polo-neck top in ribbed jersey made from a modal and cotton blend.
Long-sleeved polo-neck top in ribbed jersey made from a modal and cotton blend.

Cold shoulder blouse in an airy, patterned viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and long sleeves. Small V-neck opening with ties at the front, a flounce at the top, and narrow elastication and a flounce at the cuffs.

Cold shoulder blouse in an airy, patterned viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and long sleeves. Small V-neck opening with ties at the front, a flounce at the top, and narrow elastication and a flounce at the cuffs.
Cardboard gift pack with a silk ribbon hanger at the top containing a pair of socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with glittery threads and elasticated tops.
Cardboard gift pack with a silk ribbon hanger at the top containing a pair of socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with glittery threads and elasticated tops.
Short, off-the-shoulder top in crinkled jersey made partly from recycled polyester with short puff sleeves and elastication with a small frill trim around the top, sleeves and hem.
V-neck jersey top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and hole-patterned trims around the neckline and down the front and back. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.
V-neck jersey top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and hole-patterned trims around the neckline and down the front and back. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.

Soft, non-wired bra and a pair of briefs in lace. Bra with padded, triangular cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and no fasteners. Briefs with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.

Short top in lightweight, printed cotton sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cropped top in stretch cotton jersey in a narrow cut at the top with short, narrow shoulder straps and a racer back.

Cropped top in ribbed jersey with a V-neck, press-studs at the top and short sleeves.
Cropped top in ribbed jersey with a V-neck, press-studs at the top and short sleeves.

Off-the-shoulder blouse woven in a cotton blend with broderie anglaise. Narrow elastication and a frill trim at the top, long, wide sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a scalloped hem. Unlined.
Small shoulder bag in braided water hyacinth with a wide, patterned tie at the top, a braided shoulder strap and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 9.5x17.5x24.5 cm.

Short top in jersey crêpe with a deep V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and short sleeves. Wrapover at the back of the neck, cut-out section at the back and a seam at the hem with ties at the back.

Short top in jersey crêpe with a deep V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and short sleeves. Wrapover at the back of the neck, cut-out section at the back and a seam at the hem with ties at the back.
Cropped top in a crinkled weave with decorative buttons at the front, narrow, tie-top shoulder straps and smocking at the top and hem. The polyester content of the top is recycled.

Jumper in a soft, patterned fine knit with a round neckline and long sleeves. Soft brushed finish.
Jumper in a soft, patterned fine knit with a round neckline and long sleeves. Soft brushed finish.
Wide, high-waisted, calf-length trousers in sturdy jersey with concealed elastication at the waist and straight legs.
Wide, high-waisted, calf-length trousers in sturdy jersey with concealed elastication at the waist and straight legs.

Body in ribbed jersey with a round neck at the front and low-cut back. Shoulder straps with plastic rings, and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Short top in airy, crinkled jersey with a V-neck, decorative buttons down the front and short, wide sleeves. Narrow, covered elastication and a tie detail at the hem.
Short top in airy, crinkled jersey with a V-neck, decorative buttons down the front and short, wide sleeves. Narrow, covered elastication and a tie detail at the hem.
Short, fitted top in printed cotton jersey with short sleeves.

Short coat in a soft, felted wool blend with a wide, faux fur-lined collar. Concealed buttons at the front, a tab with a decorative button at the cuffs and welt side pockets. Lined. The wool content of the coat is recycled.

Jacket in an airy cotton and linen weave with narrow notch lapels and buttons at the front. Long sleeves with decorative buttons at the cuffs, a small fake chest pocket, patch front pockets and a single back vent. Lined sleeves.
Trousers in an airy cotton and linen weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist and a zip fly and button. Welt coin pocket, pockets in the side seams and flap back pockets with a button.
Straight-cut jacket in faux fur with concealed press-studs down the front and side pockets. Lined.
Shirt in a linen weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Shorts in a Tencel™ lyocell and linen weave containing some cotton. Zip fly and button, side pockets and fake back pockets with a flap and button.
Shorts in a Tencel™ lyocell and linen weave containing some cotton. Zip fly and button, side pockets and fake back pockets with a flap and button.
Long-sleeved cardigan in soft, fine-knit linen with a slight sheen. V-neck, buttons down the front, and ribbing around the opening, cuffs and hem.
Straight-cut T-shirt in sturdy organic cotton jersey with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
Straight-cut T-shirt in sturdy organic cotton jersey with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
Vest top in soft, striped, organic cotton jersey with a chest pocket and trim in tone-on-tone woven fabric. Button placket, a small appliqué at the side and short slits in the sides.

Rib-knit socks in a soft, organic cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit and pair of dungarees in organic cotton. Bodysuit in ribbed jersey with buttons at the top and press-studs at the crotch. Dungarees in woven fabric with elastication at the waist and hems, a patch pocket on one leg and straps that cross at the back and fasten at the front.
Ankle-length trousers in a patterned viscose weave with covered elastication and decorative ties at the waist, side pockets and side stripes.
Push-up bra in lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps that join into a lace back section, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the front.
Jumper in a soft knit with a ribbed polo neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
